fields.name: GIDD - Conflict Displacement
fields.text: New internal displacements due to conflict and violence (annual figures). Dataset: GIDD, Trigger: conflict/violence, Type: new displacements

fields.name: GIDD - Disaster Displacement
fields.text: New internal displacements due to disasters (annual figures). Dataset: GIDD, Trigger: disaster, Type: new displacements

fields.name: GIDD - Total Displacement
fields.text: Total new internal displacements (conflict + disaster, annual). Dataset: GIDD, Trigger: all, Type: new displacements combined

fields.name: IDU - New Displacements
fields.text: New displacement events reported in IDMC updates. Dataset: IDU, Trigger: all, Type: real-time displacement events

fields.name: IDU - Conflict Displacements
fields.text: New displacement events due to conflict and violence. Dataset: IDU, Trigger: conflict/violence, Type: real-time events

fields.name: IDU - Disaster Displacements
fields.text: New displacement events due to natural disasters. Dataset: IDU, Trigger: disaster, Type: real-time events

fields.name: Displacement Data
fields.text: Combined displacement data: number of IDPs in value field and displacement reason in text field

fields.name: Flood Events
fields.text: Flood-related disasters in Sudan

fields.name: Drought Events
fields.text: Drought-related disasters in Sudan

fields.name: Conflict-Related Disasters
fields.text: Conflict or violence-related disasters in Sudan

fields.name: Total Events
fields.text: Total number of conflict events recorded by ACLED

fields.name: Fatalities
fields.text: Total fatalities from conflict events recorded by ACLED

fields.name: Battles
fields.text: Number of battle/armed clash events recorded by ACLED

fields.name: Violence Against Civilians
fields.text: Number of violence against civilians events recorded by ACLED

fields.name: Explosions/Remote Violence
fields.text: Number of explosion/remote violence events recorded by ACLED

fields.name: Riots/Demonstrations
fields.text: Number of riot/demonstration events recorded by ACLED

fields.name: Strategic Developments
fields.text: Number of strategic development events recorded by ACLED

fields.name: Crisis Alerts
fields.text: Real-time crisis alerts and early warning signals from Dataminr FirstAlert API, including breaking news and emerging risk intelligence from social media and public information sources

fields.name: Food Insecurity (IPC)
fields.text: IPC food insecurity phase classification (1-5 scale): 1=Minimal, 2=Stressed, 3=Crisis, 4=Emergency, 5=Famine. Area-weighted aggregation to ADM2 level from FEWSNET ML1 shapefiles.

fields.name: CAST - Forecasted Battles
fields.text: ACLED CAST forecasted number of battles/armed clashes for the month (state-level prediction)

fields.name: CAST - Forecasted Explosions/Remote Violence
fields.text: ACLED CAST forecasted number of explosions/remote violence events for the month (state-level prediction)

fields.name: CAST - Forecasted Violence Against Civilians
fields.text: ACLED CAST forecasted number of violence against civilians events for the month (state-level prediction)

fields.name: CAST - Total Forecasted Conflicts
fields.text: ACLED CAST total forecasted number of conflicts for the month (state-level prediction)

fields.name: GloFAS - Population Affected
fields.text: Estimated population with at high risk of being affected by forecasted floods. Based on GloFAS Rapid Flood Mapping overlaid with population data at ADM2 level.
